email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 12,000MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai under FOB terms. Could you provide vessel availability and a starting freight rate? We are targeting a laycan of October 10-15.

Best regards,
Laura Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER, currently in Antwerp, which can be repositioned to Rotterdam for your laycan. The starting freight rate is $45 per metric tonne. The vessel has a DWT of 50,000 and an LOA of 190m.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Peter Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate of $45 seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider lowering it to $42 per metric tonne? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rates and the expected loading window in Rotterdam?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Laura Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

After reviewing the market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of $43 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is $12,000 per day, and the loading window in Rotterdam is expected to be 3 days, starting from October 10.

Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Best regards,
Peter Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000MT - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for the revised offer. We accept the rate of $43 per metric tonne and the demurrage rate of $12,000 per day. Please proceed with the booking and send us the contract details.

Best regards,
Laura Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Shanghai, Steel Coils 12,000MT - Contract Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for confirming. I will send the contract details shortly. The laycan is confirmed for October 10-15, and the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER will be ready for loading in Rotterdam on October 10.

Best regards,
Peter Nguyen
